document_data.name: Reinhar IV
document_data.mainbody: '''Reinhar IV''' was a king of the [[Arkaiun]]s of [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Relationships: The man who would rule as Reinhar IV was nephew to King [[Reinhar III]] through a sister. He had at least three sons, two of whom would rule as [[Reinhar V]] and [[Reinhar VI]] after him.
document_data.History:
Reinhar IV was born in the [[572 DR|Year of Withing Darkness, 572 DR]].

When King Reinhar III and his two sons were killed by [[giants]] while on a hunting trip in [[600 DR]], this triggered a short war of succession. At the end of the war, Reinhar IV took the throne of his uncle.<ref name=tGHotR-p92>

In [[617 DR]], a plague causing bloating spread throughout Dambrath, killing ten percent of the population, including Reinhar IV.<ref name=tGHotR-p93> His second son succeeded him as Reinhar V.
